roleset.name: unlikelihood
roleset.note: IMPROBABILITY-N, IMPROBABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: improbability-n
example.text: We can only stand amazed at the improbability of the actual event if we specify it a priori:

example.name: improbable-j
example.text: Developing the theory [ This Dynamic Earth , USGS ] [Continental drift]-1 was hotly debated off and on for decades following Wegener 's death before it was largely dismissed as *PRO*-1 being eccentric , preposterous , and improbable .
